/* Nancy Shevell */ merge sentences into paragraph

small tidying, removing repetition of the marriage partners' names.
/* Nancy Shevell */ Changed tense of "dating" comments.
/* Nancy Shevell */ It's only necessary to state once that they got married on 2011-10-09.
/* Drugs */ added italics for magazine title

Added details of wedding to Nancy Shevell 9-10-11
/* Childhood */ Roman Catholic is not an adverb
[Pu408]Tweak: title. Combined duplicate references. You can [[WP:UCB|use this bot]] yourself. [[WP:DBUG|Report bugs here]].

1st mention of antions; UK date & spelling
add why he used the Bali bombings as an excuse
/* Since 1970 */ removed in the 20th century as it's superfluous - it's his last tour of Australia ever
removed "in the 20th century" as it was his final tour, absolutely, not just of the 20th century (also clicked on 'm' minor edit by mistake
removed "in the 20th century" as it was his final tour, absolutely, not just of the 20th century
/* Since 1970 */ correct date of image - see talk
rv to British spelling; POV; reliable source
add references - Bali as a reason tour date was cancelled
re-add Australia details. It's important to note that in his huge career he's only deemed Australia fit for 3 visits.
